channel.title: Documentation on Datapio
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Datapio

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Introduction Datapio is a framework used to automate 80% of the generic use cases you may encounter in the life cycle of your project, and configure the remaining 20%. It abstracts common actions in a fully automated process, such as: continuous integration and deployment of your business code automated generation of the infrastructure used to run your business code multi-environment support based on your preferred Git flow Datapio OpenCore Designed for Kubernetes, Datapio OpenCore provides a wide set of pre-configured technologies to help you alleviate the workload needed to get your application up and running:
